name: Santa Fe Grande Pepper
description: Santa Fe Grande peppers are a chili pepper cultivar that produces conical fruits 5-10cm long that resemble jalapeno peppers. Peppers ripen from pale yellow to bright orange or red and have a sweet, mildly spicy taste. They have a Scoville Heat rating of 0-999 units and are often pickled or added to salsas. Plants are resistant to the tobacco mosaic virus.
sowing_method: Direct seed indoors, transplant seedlings outside after hardening off
